title: The faithful testimony of that antient servant of the Lord, and minister of the everlasting Gospel William Dewsbery his books, epistles and writings, collected and printed for future service.
author: Dewsbury, William, 1621-1688.
publisher: Printed and sold by Andrew Sowle ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Pages 138-163 and 202-223 filmed from the Union Theological Seminary Library and spliced at end.
Testimonies and biographical sketches by George Whitehead, George Fox and others. [14] p.
